title: A comparative study on optimizing electrocoagulation for organic contaminant removal in shale gas fracturing wastewater
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00373J, Paper
Lingjie Xu, Hua Zhang, Yilin Wang, Qingji Wang, Xiaopeng Wang, Zhen Luo, Xiaojuan Zhai
Shale gas fracturing wastewater (FW) exhibits high total dissolved solids (TDS) content, averaging 13 g L−1, along with an average total suspended solids (TSS) content of 676 mg L−1 and an average chemical oxygen demand (COD) content of 1370 mg L−1.
